plot: Though the recession officially ended in summer 2009, the fallout continues for some 25 million unemployed and underemployed Americans, many of whom worked their way up the corporate ladder...
title: Hard Times: Lost on Long Island
plot_es: Though the recession officially ended in summer 2009, the fallout continues for some 25 million unemployed and underemployed Americans, many of whom worked their way up the corporate ladder...
original_name: Hard Times: Lost on Long Island
